parent_tickets.ticket_content:
This is to bring to your attention that we are experiencing frequent

kplc black out, this may cause to damage of m/cs since our systems are

on raw power.

I have tested the 3kva apc ups it requires 4pc batteries(12v17ah), i

suggest we can use it as back up for the main systems as we wait for

socomec issue to be sorted out.

child_tickets.ticket_content: Re-Assigned
﻿Has been assigned to you﻿

#vivainsightsmonthlydigestaddteamview .heading,
#monthlydigestaddteamview .heading {
font-size: 16px;
line-height: 20px;
color: #212121;
margin: 0px;
font-weight: 600;
}

#cpmonthlybillstatementview .heading {
font-size: 14px;
line-height: 20px;
color: #212121;
margin: 0px;
font-weight: 600;
}

#monthlydigestaddteamview .viva-insights-monthly-insight-cell {
padding: 32px 24px 0px;
}

.monthly-digest-add-team-subtitle {
padding: 0px 0px 12px;
}

.bodyDirection_ltr .work-hours-cell {
padding-left: 15px;
}

.bodyDirection_rtl .work-hours-cell {
padding-right: 15px;
}

.bodyDirection_ltr .time-zone-cell {
padding: 24px 0px 0px 15px;
}

.bodyDirection_rtl .time-zone-cell {
padding: 24px 15px 0px 0px;
}

#vivaattributionfooterview .vivaAttributionFooterCell {
padding: 16px 16px 8px;
}

.vivaAttributionFooterTitle {
color: #212121;
font-size: 16px;
font-weight: 500;
text-align: center;
line-height: 22px;
margin: 16px 0px 7px;
}

.vivaAttributionFooterBody {
font-size: 14px;
text-align: center;
line-height: 20px;
color: #616161;
margin: 0px 0px 21px;
}

.vivaModulePadding {
padding: 16px 16px 0px;
}

.bodyDirection_ltr .monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag {
padding: 16px 16px 5px 0px
}

.bodyDirection_rtl .monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag {
padding: 16px 0px 5px 16px
}

.monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag p {
font-size: 12px;
line-height: 14px;
color: #FFFFFF;
font-weight: 400;
}

.monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag-cell {
padding: 5px 9px;
display: inline-block;
background-color: #69AFE5;
border-style: none;
}

.empty-container {
padding: 0px;
font-size: 0px;
line-height: 0px;
border-style: none;
width: 100%;
}

.monthly-digest-wpa-connector-text td {
padding: 18px 17px 30px;
text-align: center;
}

.wpa-column-second .subtitle td,
.wpa-column-second_row_one .subtitle td {
padding-top: 6px
}

#monthlydigestwpaprogressview .wpa-connector-image td {
padding: 33px 0px 0px 0px;
text-align: center;
}

#monthlydigestwpaprogressview .monthly-digest-wpa-connector-text td {
padding: 18px 17px 40px;
text-align: center;
}

#digestvivapreannouncementbannerview .briefingAnnouncementBannerTitle {
font-weight: 600;
line-height: 26px;
font-size: 20px;
color: #4A4A4A;
}

#digestvivapreannouncementbannerview .briefingAnnouncementBannerBody {
font-weight: 400;
line-height: 21px;
font-size: 16px;
color: #4A4A4A;
}

p.smallEmptyElement {
line-height: 2px;
font-size: 2px;
margin: 0;
}

Good afternoon.


Thank you for your concern. It is noted that Victor Mugambi signed the contract as a census clerk. With the shortage in the GA staff and based on his earlier experience, it was agreed
that he be redeployed to the General assistant position.


He will be issued with a letter officially communicating the changes.


Thank you.

From: Lydia Masaki <lmasaki@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke>

IMutua@gokhanmasterspaejv.co.ke <IMutua@gokhanmasterspaejv.co.ke>; Julius Ondijo <jondijo@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke>
Subject: BUSIA STAFF REDEPLOYMENT - CENSUS CLERK; VICTOR MUGAMBI



 






Good morning. 




 




I trust that you are all well.




 




We have excess census clerks (seven instead of six) and less general assistants (eight instead on nine) After the contract signing exercise at the site, the HR nominated Victor Mugambi considering
his previous experience to be transferred to the general assistant's docket to cure the shortage. 




 




Since he had already signed a census clerk contract, we expected to have the same changed and communicated for us to effect the change at the station. 




 




Was there an afterthought? Kindly but urgently advise the way forward on this matter. 





 








Kind Regards,


 





Lydia Masaki |
Assistant Weighbridge Manager



Address: Unit
32 Fortis Industrial Park |
P.O Box 7193 - 00300 Nairobi
Email: lmasaki@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke |
Mobile: 0728695524 |





Dear Grace,




 




The above issue has been assigned to you. Kindly give us feedback when it will be resolved.




 




Regards,




 




Ramadhan Hassan

Good evening Sir,


This is to formally inform you that the HSWIM traffic lights have been set

to only show green on both bounds. This communicates to the drivers to

proceed as they have cleared which is not the case. 


We have enough complaints already, problems to explain and do a lot of chases to return trucks to weigh at the multideck.  


Kindly find it necessary to have the lights switched off until integration is done. 


Kind Regards,

 

Lydia Masaki | Assistant Weighbridge Manager

child_tickets.ticket_title: BUSIA HIGH SPEED WEIGHING IN MOTION TRAFFIC LIGHTS
child_tickets.ticket_content:
Dear Wellington,


The above ticket has been assigned to you.


Regards,


Ramadhan

parent_tickets.ticket_content:
Greetings.

The above vehicle today had transported police officers to attend to court matters at Ahero court. 


On their way back at about 1400hrs around river Yala, the left side wheel stud broke

off loosening rear left side tire causing it to shear off while the vehicle was in motion. Fortunately, the driver was driving at a relatively low speed and on that account was able to control it to stop meters ahead. Arrangements were made to have the tire fixed and have it driven back to the station. 


It was noted at that moment that breaks linings was damaged and some bolts were missing. 


We need at any given time to have two vehicles at the station for mobile patrol and chase. 


Kindly plan urgently to have this vehicle undergo proper diagnosis and repairs for smooth daily operations. 


Kind Regards,


Lydia Masaki 

Assistant Weighbridge Manager

Lydia Masaki

Hopefully this mail finds you in good health. During our mobile operations on the 24th

day of January 2022 while doing a chase, a rowdy crowd pelted stones at

our car. The end result was, our back left window was broken. We

reported the case at Katito police station and took the vehicle to

Kisumu motor vehicle inspection yard the following day for inspection.

The inspection was done and recommended that the glass window be

replaced. Since then to now we are operating with the broken window. It

is a safety risk to drive a mobile vehicle in such a condition.  

 

Kindly facilitate for the repair of the said window to help mobile operations run smoothly.

Dear team,






As per the previous emails we are not having back up power since the UPS at the station is not working and it needs to be addressed. 


Currently the HSWIM is failing due to the frequent power outages that have become rampant with the ongoing rains. The situation needs to be addressed as fast as possible to eliminate the problem of devices break down and the eventualities of the same.










Best Regards,



 









Sammy Chira |

32 Fortis Industrial Park |

Hey there,
A few weeks ago, we introduced the IndexNow protocol as one of our new features.
And boy, have our users loved it!
Wondering what IndexNow is and why there’s so much fuss about it in SEO circles?
For a quick answer (in plain English, no tech speak or jargon, I promise!), check out our easy-to-understand explanation here.
So, what is the IndexNow protocol?
The IndexNow protocol allows users to quickly and easily submit URLs to all participating search engines.
As a result, any changes you make to your content are indexed instantly by search engines.
What does this mean?
Your content gets to rank faster as search engines crawl and index it more quickly.
Your visitors get the latest information, resulting in a positive user experience.
Want to know more about IndexNow and how to implement it on your site?
Find all your answers here:
👉 What is IndexNow for SEO (Explained in Plain English)? 👈
Here’s to faster indexing and better ranking.
Till next time,
Kato
Product Educator, AIOSEO

<div class="WordSection1">
<p class="MsoNormal">Good afternoon Victor,</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"> </p>
<p class="MsoNormal">The vehicle tagging module on KENWEI here in Rongo has failed.
</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"> </p>
<p class="MsoNormal">From our end, we can tag vehicles but upon testing, the notifications do not pop up on the weigh PC. This means that any vehicle that is newly tagged will not be flagged before being weighed thereby defeating the purpose of the tagging.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"> </p>
<p class="MsoNormal">We have checked the system and is unable to determine what the issue is. I have also spoken to the previous SAs who say that this module has not been working for a long time and efforts to have it checked were dropped as the system was
meant to be upgraded.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"> </p>
<p class="MsoNormal">As is, we are currently operating blind as regards this module and we need a solution that will help us move forward.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"> </p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Kind regards,</p>
<p class="MsoNormal"> </p>

<p class="MsoNormal"></p>

Hey there,
Everyone loves a beautiful website.
That’s why we all take our time to look for the perfect theme to showcase our brand and products.
However, WordPress themes aren’t just about aesthetics.
They also have an impact on your SEO.
That’s why you must carefully choose the theme you use for your site and take note of those that are SEO-friendly.
FYI, the best themes for SEO are lightweight, load fast, and offer exceptional functionality.
To help you pick the perfect theme for your website, we compiled a list of 21 of the best WordPress themes for SEO.
Check out the article here.
Using a theme that’s optimized for SEO will:
1. Help you meet Google’s Core Web Vitals standards used to rank sites.
2. Ensure your website offers users a positive experience.
Both reasons are crucial as they increase your visibility in search and lead to high conversion rates.
So, go ahead and check out our favorite WordPress themes and improve your SEO.

Happy rankings,
Kato

parent_tickets.ticket_content:
Hey there,
We’ve just released AIOSEO 4.2.0 and we’re pretty sure you’ll love the new features.
SEO is a competitive marketing strategy that requires you to take advantage of everything that can help you rank above the competition.
That’s why we’re excited to introduce these new features — 2 new dashboard widgets and the Strip Category Base Prefix feature.
Here’s why these new features matter:
Set Up widget: Helps you configure your website's general SEO for better indexing.
AIOSEO Overview widget: Categorizes your posts so you know which posts need urgent attention.

The Strip Category Base Prefix: Lets you remove the category from your URLs, leaving you with a cleaner and easy-to-remember URL.
For more information on what to expect from AIOSEO 4.2.0, read our announcement post here.

We hope you’ll find these updates helpful to your business. Let us know if you have any feedback or would like to suggest a feature by replying to this email.
As always, thank you for helping us make AIOSEO the world’s best WordPress SEO plugin. We genuinely appreciate your support.
Here’s to a productive 2022 for your business.
Talk soon,
Benjamin Rojas
President, All in One SEO (AIOSEO)

parent_tickets.ticket_content: Hello  sir,This is to report on an incident that happened today at around 1220hrs where having set our mobile scales to weigh trucks from Ndhiwa heading to Rodi Kopany at a place called Kobodo, an empty motor vehicle, Reg. No. KCE364E, Make Ashok Leyland belonging to Kokal Brothers from the opposite direction swerved from its side to the side we had set up our equipment, running over one of our mobile scales, Serial No. 40060, damaging the scale as per our Maintenance Technicians assessment report attached.The driver of the truck later identified as David Ochieng Okal was escorted to Rodi Police Station where he was charged and detained. The truck was also detained at the same Police Station.He blamed the incident on faulty brakes and accepted the liability. Thank you,Duncan Ongayo, Assistant Weighbridge Manager.

Hey there,
We’re here with another exciting update to your most-loved SEO plugin!
We’ve just released AIOSEO 4.2.2, and it’s jam-packed with many features and improvements to help boost your SEO.
You’ll especially love these 2 new features:
User Social Profiles: Connect your social media profiles to your WordPress user account for better discoverability in search.

Translation API: This makes it easy for third-party translation apps to hook into AIOSEO’s data and output it in local languages.
⭐ Check out the complete announcement post here ⭐
We’ve also improved many of the features you already use. An excellent example is better link suggestions in Link Assistant so you can build more strategic internal links.
Overall, AIOSEO 4.2.2 brings more functionality, increased efficiency, and a better overall user experience. These changes have just made ranking your content much more effortless!
Ready to check out AIOSEO 4.2.2? All of the details you need are right here:
⭐ See NEW features + screenshots here⭐
We hope you’ll find these updates helpful to your business. And if you have any feedback or would like to suggest a feature, let us know by replying to this email.
As always, thank you for helping us make AIOSEO the world’s best WordPress SEO plugin. We genuinely appreciate your support.
Here’s to a productive 2022 for your business.
Talk soon,
Benjamin Rojas
President, All in One SEO (AIOSEO)

Can you believe All In One SEO (AIOSEO) turns 15 years old this week? 🎉

We want to celebrate our birthday by giving back to those who helped us grow — you and all other users.
For the next 7 days, we’re running a jaw-dropping sale on all paid plans.
🥳 Get up to 65% off our paid plans here 🥳

Link Assistant: You can add and monitor internal links easily and quickly.

Just like most birthday parties, this won’t be around for long. So make sure to get to the party as soon as you can.
So, what are you waiting for?

Good evening, I would like to report an incident at Rongo weighbridge by the above-mentioned truck. At around 2150HRS The track rammed a bollard at the approach of Kisii bound damaging it as shown. While leaving the scale, the vehicle rammed

Hey there,
We’re here with another exciting update to your most-loved SEO plugin!
We’ve just released AIOSEO 4.2.2, and it’s jam-packed with many features and improvements to help boost your SEO.
You’ll especially love these 2 new features:
User Social Profiles: Connect your social media profiles to your WordPress user account for better discoverability in search.

Translation API: This makes it easy for third-party translation apps to hook into AIOSEO’s data and output it in local languages.
⭐ Check out the complete announcement post here ⭐
We’ve also improved many of the features you already use. An excellent example is better link suggestions in Link Assistant so you can build more strategic internal links.
Overall, AIOSEO 4.2.2 brings more functionality, increased efficiency, and a better overall user experience. These changes have just made ranking your content much more effortless!
Ready to check out AIOSEO 4.2.2? All of the details you need are right here:
⭐ See NEW features + screenshots here⭐
We hope you’ll find these updates helpful to your business. And if you have any feedback or would like to suggest a feature, let us know by replying to this email.
As always, thank you for helping us make AIOSEO the world’s best WordPress SEO plugin. We genuinely appreciate your support.
Here’s to a productive 2022 for your business.
Talk soon,
Benjamin Rojas
President, All in One SEO (AIOSEO)

Hey there,
We’re here with another exciting update to your most-loved SEO plugin!
We’ve just released AIOSEO 4.2.2, and it’s jam-packed with many features and improvements to help boost your SEO.
You’ll especially love these 2 new features:
User Social Profiles: Connect your social media profiles to your WordPress user account for better discoverability in search.

Translation API: This makes it easy for third-party translation apps to hook into AIOSEO’s data and output it in local languages.
⭐ Check out the complete announcement post here ⭐
We’ve also improved many of the features you already use. An excellent example is better link suggestions in Link Assistant so you can build more strategic internal links.
Overall, AIOSEO 4.2.2 brings more functionality, increased efficiency, and a better overall user experience. These changes have just made ranking your content much more effortless!
Ready to check out AIOSEO 4.2.2? All of the details you need are right here:
⭐ See NEW features + screenshots here⭐
We hope you’ll find these updates helpful to your business. And if you have any feedback or would like to suggest a feature, let us know by replying to this email.
As always, thank you for helping us make AIOSEO the world’s best WordPress SEO plugin. We genuinely appreciate your support.
Here’s to a productive 2022 for your business.
Talk soon,
Benjamin Rojas
President, All in One SEO (AIOSEO)

support@aioseo.com to your address book or whitelist us. Want out of
the loop? Unsubscribe.

Hello helpdesk@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke!
New topic has been created on your subscribed forum - Main Forum.

Tips Bermain Games PKV online

Trik bermain pertaruhan online menjadi senjata rahasia pkv games untuk bisa menang bermain play pertaruhan on the web. Cara itu sangat bisa membantu anda untuk mampu menang bermain pertaruhan di agen bola tangkas on the web. Anda mampu juga gunakan daya ini untuk permainan bandar poker, sakong, aduq. Untuk mampu bermain games ini cukup muda serta berbuat curang part bisa menang permainan judi lewat games di pkv games. Coba pandang trik ini datang beberapa kali supaya bisa paham sahih bermain, jangan khilaf diri anda jika anda belum berusaha melihat games tersebut.

Jika anda sedang belum paham lagi dengan trik tersebut bisa langsung ada dan tanyakan ke cs situs pertaruhan on the web. Pemain demi memastikan bahwa pra mereka memulai pengembaraan mereka. Mereka sepenuhnya menyadari dan paham seluruh mekanisme, hukum, dan pedoman produk. Setiap pemain demi memahami bahwa seharga mempertaruhkan uang mereka di situs web yang dapat diandalkan seperti ini dan tentu saja. Pilih permainan yang sesuai beserta pengetahuan mereka. Slot Online Terpopuler

Keseimbangan dan keamanan saat bermain judi on the web. Sulit menemukan situs terbaik dan sekali lalu kasino web menyimpangkan aman. Namun, situs yang aman layak untuk pencarian and menunggu para tokoh. Situs web pkv games dirancang untuk orang yang suka bermain kapan aja dan di mana saja. Mereka diamankan dengan setiap keterangan yang dienkripsi ke sistem mereka untuk melindungi situs web mereka serta untuk kesejahteraan pemain. Terdapat banyak generator poin acak atau terpilih dan digunakan di bertransaksi di pada setiap permainan judi on the web. Orang memiliki keleluasaan mereka sendiri di memilih game yang mereka sukai untuk dimainkan secara on line. Apa yang perlu anda tahu dalam bermain pada pkv games?

Page Pkv Games Online Deposit 24 Jam
Apa tersebut situs agen pkv games on the web? Pkv games online adalah site page permainan kartu online store 24 jam langsung permainan bandarq, dominoqq dan poker. Dimana pada setiap para part harus bisa mendaftarkan diri terlebih dahulu/bisa langsung bertanya kepada pkv games. Web pkv games sudah terkenal sejak 2 tahun lalu berarti situs judi online nomor satu di indonesia.

Barangkali anda yang lumayan mencari site page terkemuka mengenai situs perjudian online dengan pkv games indonesia. Anda bisa langsung simpatik bermain di situs untuk melawan 7 player yang padahal menunggu untuk anda bertanding. Carilah nilai contracting tinggi 9 (sembilan) untuk mampu menang uang yang ada di meja permainan judi slip on the web. Mungkin kamu penasaran dengan produk judi online secara pkv games.

Salah satu situs pkv games online store 24 jam yang sudah terkenal dalam berbagai informasi and bisa kita jumpai mana dengan foto promosi. Situs itu mengajak anda bermain bersama dengan player lainnya dengan irrelevant store 10 ribu. Jika menang kami akan kembalikan credit dan langsung membawa ke rekening kamu langsung pada hari itu.

Futile hela dana 25 seperseribu menghibur hati untuk bisa bermain serta menang bersama web judi on the web. Apa lagi bank yang aktif setiap silam hari banyak yang online semua serta bisa langsung bermain. Bank lokal nusantara yang tersedia on line layanan 24 weker. Jika bisa manfaatkan trasfer dengan clear yang unik supaya bisa mempermuda store pkv games di setiap harinya.

Nah, itulah uraian dari artikel kami mengenai apa tersebut pkv games. Semoga dengan adanya infomasi ini bermanfaat untuk anda.

font-weight: 600;
}

#cpmonthlybillstatementview .heading {
font-size: 14px;
line-height: 20px;
color: #212121;
margin: 0px;
font-weight: 600;
}

.monthly-digest-add-team-subtitle {
padding: 0px 0px 12px;
}

.bodyDirection_ltr .work-hours-cell {
padding-left: 15px;
}

.bodyDirection_rtl .work-hours-cell {
padding-right: 15px;
}

.bodyDirection_ltr .time-zone-cell {
padding: 24px 0px 0px 15px;
}

.bodyDirection_rtl .time-zone-cell {
padding: 24px 15px 0px 0px;
}

#vivaattributionfooterview .vivaAttributionFooterCell {
padding: 16px 16px 8px;
}

.vivaAttributionFooterTitle {
color: #212121;
font-size: 16px;
font-weight: 500;
text-align: center;
line-height: 22px;
margin: 16px 0px 7px;
}

.vivaAttributionFooterBody {
font-size: 14px;
text-align: center;
line-height: 20px;
color: #616161;
margin: 0px 0px 21px;
}

.vivaModulePadding {
padding: 16px 16px 0px;
}

.bodyDirection_ltr .monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag {
padding: 16px 16px 5px 0px
}

.bodyDirection_rtl .monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag {
padding: 16px 0px 5px 16px
}

.monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag p,
.monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag h4 {
font-size: 12px;
line-height: 14px;
color: #FFFFFF;
font-weight: 400;
}

.monthly-wpa-connector-new-tag-cell {
padding: 5px 9px;
display: inline-block;
background-color: #69AFE5;
border-style: none;
}

.empty-container {
padding: 0px;
font-size: 0px;
line-height: 0px;
border-style: none;
width: 100%;
}

.monthly-digest-wpa-connector-text td {
padding: 18px 17px 30px;
text-align: center;
}

.wpa-column-second .subtitle td,
.wpa-column-second_row_one .subtitle td {
padding-top: 6px
}

#monthlydigestwpaprogressview .wpa-connector-image td {
padding: 33px 0px 0px 0px;
text-align: center;
}

#monthlydigestwpaprogressview .monthly-digest-wpa-connector-text td {
padding: 18px 17px 40px;
text-align: center;
}

p.smallEmptyElement {
line-height: 2px;
font-size: 2px;
margin: 0;
}

Hey there,
We’re here with another exciting update to your most-loved SEO plugin!
We’ve just released AIOSEO 4.2.2, and it’s jam-packed with many features and improvements to help boost your SEO.
You’ll especially love these 2 new features:
User Social Profiles: Connect your social media profiles to your WordPress user account for better discoverability in search.

Translation API: This makes it easy for third-party translation apps to hook into AIOSEO’s data and output it in local languages.
⭐ Check out the complete announcement post here ⭐
We’ve also improved many of the features you already use. An excellent example is better link suggestions in Link Assistant so you can build more strategic internal links.
Overall, AIOSEO 4.2.2 brings more functionality, increased efficiency, and a better overall user experience. These changes have just made ranking your content much more effortless!
Ready to check out AIOSEO 4.2.2? All of the details you need are right here:
⭐ See NEW features + screenshots here⭐
We hope you’ll find these updates helpful to your business. And if you have any feedback or would like to suggest a feature, let us know by replying to this email.
As always, thank you for helping us make AIOSEO the world’s best WordPress SEO plugin. We genuinely appreciate your support.
Here’s to a productive 2022 for your business.
Talk soon,
Benjamin Rojas
President, All in One SEO (AIOSEO)

parent_tickets.ticket_content:
Good morning Team,


Thanks, Bwana Julius, for bringing this up.


We should all note that we have a contractual reequipment from our client that we attend to issues/matters which arise from the station and resolve them within certain timelines which are defined from the contract document.


Because of such resolution timelines, the client came up with the help desk team whose soul mandate is to keep records of all those issues/matters that affect operations on a daily/weekly/monthly/quarterly/annually so
that they are addressed to enable the operations to run smoothly.


 


It is from that background that it is important to have all these issues reported directly to the helpdesk for the purposes of tracking their resolutions within the timeliness prescribed within the contract.


Failure to implementing this as envisaged in the contracts attracts a penalty which nobody would like to imagine.


In this regard, we expect the SA/Technical teams on site to take this matter seriously and have all issues reported to the helpdesk on time and resolutions made as per the contract with the client.


 


Attached to this email is is a letter from the RE showing all the equipment within our respective stations and the timelines that we are expected to have them maintained and failure to observe this will attract a daily
penalty of ksh100,000 after the 3rd day.


It is from this that we request an updated list of all our ICT and Technical equipment health status so that we can move forward.


CM and AOPM, please ensure that all the equipment’s within the stations are captured as per the letter attached by the respective ICT and Technical teams on the ground.


Let’s take note and action this urgently.


 



Best Regards,


 





Maurice Ademba
| Operations Manager



Address:
Unit 32 Fortis Industrial Park
| P.O Box 7193 - 00300


Email:
mademba@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke
|


Mobile: 0720 175931
|

Subject: Rongo Mobile Incident




 



Hello  sir,




This is to report on an incident that happened today at around 1220hrs where having set our mobile scales to weigh trucks from Ndhiwa heading to Rodi Kopany at a place called Kobodo, an empty
motor vehicle, Reg. No. KCE364E, Make Ashok Leyland belonging to Kokal Brothers from the opposite direction swerved from its side to the side we had set up our equipment, running over one of our mobile scales,
Serial No. 40060, damaging the scale as per our Maintenance Technicians assessment report attached.




The driver of the truck later identified as
David Ochieng Okal was escorted to Rodi Police Station where he was charged and detained. The truck was also detained at the same Police Station.




He blamed the incident on faulty brakes and accepted the liability. 




Thank you,





 






Best Regards,

Greetings Sir






Kindly see below technical issues at Rongo station for quick resolution.







The CCTV cameras are very old and do not give clear pictures. DVR log in rights, we don't have the log in rights for the DVR, where we cannot download footages. Most of the signages are old and worn out as shown in the attached pictures. The station lighting is insufficient, we need replacement of 5 floodlights( 2pcs 400w, 1pc 300w, 2pcs 50w). Additional Yard floodlight, materials needed( 20m 2.5 flex cable, 400w floodlight). Equipment we need to do our work efficiently( Toolbox, multi-meter and Laptop). Air conditioners are very old and not working efficiently. Archive Room full, we need a place to take the old and unused materials.

Wellingtone,


 


Kindly see below technical issues at Busia station for resolution.


 



Deck 1 and 2 of the Multideck are sinking due to poor concrete works.
The CCTV cameras are very old and do not give clear pictures.
We currently don't have the Admin log in rights for the DVR, where we cannot download footages.
The contractors sign and other signages are old and worn out and require to be replaced.
Additional lights are needed for the Holding Yard, Directing Office and Kampala Bound Deck
 The Air conditioners are very old and not working efficiently, replacements are needed as well as additional ACs are needed for the new directing offices and container offices.

parent_tickets.ticket_content:
Good afternoon,


 


Please note the below as regards this issue:


 



I can confirm that the system is showing the right fee/fine for charged trucks under EAC Act as evident on the attached ticket.

The system can give the correct USD figure for the corresponding Gross or Axle overload as prescribed in the EACVCL Act. However, the challenge we have is that the computation of charges is based on the highest weight
values and not the highest overload fee payable which should be the case where we have both the axle and gross overloads. This should be looked into immediately to assist in resolving the issue of computation of charges.


 



The main CHALLENGE is that the system is charging trucks with the first ticket which should not be the case since the truck should be allowed to reweigh before it is charged.

Overloaded trucks usually have a 30 minute window to request for a reweigh before being charged. Computation of charges is normally done using the reweigh ticket except for cases where foul play on the transporter’s part
has been detected. It would be advantageous to enable the computer operator prosecutor to select the ticket to use when charging so as to enable them get the correct overload computations. This will also assist with transporters who have tried to re-distribute
their loads and are unable to attain compliance or low axle load limits and as such have opted to pay the corresponding overload fee which is on the final reweigh ticket.


 



You need to be able to add the x5 factor for vehicles carrying hazardous materials and cannot be offloaded at the yard to the system. We have not seen a provision
for this on the system.

 



Narrations and computations of charges or releases should be centered properly on the relevant weigh tickets so that they can be clear. For the narrations on computation
of charges please refer to the attached ticket from Juja Weighbridge as a guide. We request that you add ‘CHARGE AS PER EACVLC ACT REGULATION 2018’ before the actual computation of charges.

 


Regards,


 





Philip Diero
| Duty Manager



Address:
Bellways Centre, 2nd Floor
| P.O Box 7193 - 00300 Nairobi

Email:
pdiero@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke
|


Mobile:
0719 720
992

Kindly check on the above raised issues.

From: Victor Mbindyo

Sent: Friday, July 29, 2022 10:33 AM

To: James Mwita;
michael@micna.co.ke

Cc: Maurice Ademba;
Zeph Otieno;
Julius Ondijo

Subject: Kenload Version 2 Issues



 


Dear Michael,


 


Kindly confirm the status of the below Kenload v2 issues which have been raised.


 


Busia station;



The system is not computing the fines/fees to be paid by the transporter under EAC Act as shown in the attached ticket for truck KDG618U.These forces us to continue with the manual computation
of the rates which is prone to errors.

We are changing how it picks.



The system on occasions sends the same trucks to yard more than once at the same time i.e., KCQ266U (17th July 2022 at 2106 hours)

We will update to solve the issue



The system sends trucks that have legal weights to the yard. i.e. KCF589N (20th July 2022 at 1450 hours) and KCF319W (17th July 2022 at 1736 hours) yet the exit tickets
are indicated legal.

We will update to solve the issue


 



Kindly enable Computer Operator Weighing admit trucks that are offloading, especially those with valid permits, which are yet to offload to legal weights to the yard.

We will resolve this part with the update.


 



We have trucks with Valid permits charged and sent to yard by the system yet while weighing the truck, the COW, had the Popup of the valid permit details displayed on the screen and the truck
right fully exited from the multideck. I.e., KCP822R (19th July 2022 at 2237hours) and KCX120S (20th July 2022 at 1754hours

We will resolve this part with the update.


 



Check on the configurations and remove those with the wrong permissible weights i.e., 6*S/WD/DDD that give 48,500 kgs as permissible weight instead of the 49,000kgs.

This is resolved. Confirm


 



The Computer Operator Weighing is unable to link reliever trucks to the overloaded truck in the system

On the Weighing Screen you can add the relief truck while weighing the empty vehicle as seen below


 



For the COP they can add the vehicle on the case details.


 



 



The system is unable to save the Scale tests.

We have worked on it. Check after the update.



Some overload trucks are not sent to yard i.e KBL792M (24th July 2022) .

This Vehicle was not found



The system is special releasing vehicle with the first weight even after redistribution of the overload.

 



Front view NPR on both bounds is not scanning number plates and capturing images.

This is resolved. Confirm!


Rongo Station;



There axles trucks have their GVW weights wrongly configured to 35000kg and 30500kg instead of 26000kg and 23750kg for 3A and 3* Respectively.

This is resolved. Confirm!



Special configuration trucks like 6*SWDDDD has been assigned less weights instead of 49000kgs.This should be reviewed for all those trucks with special kind of configurations.

This is resolved. Confirm!



Time frames for reweighs are not shown.

 



There are no prior alerts or notifications for vehicles coming for re-weigh.

This is resolved. Confirm!



Billing sheet for charged vehicles in conservation from USD to KES.

To be solve on update



Weights taken during the initial weighing is sometimes lost forcing the computer operator to re-weigh the truck again.

We have tested on our end not seen the issue. We will update and then check If it will occur.


 



The COPs have no right to raise billing sheets, yet this is their responsibilities.

This is resolved. Confirm!



The system is not able to feed impounded trucks data from the VI.

We have shown the today VI on how to add the Heavy Vehicles


 


 


 


Regards,


 





Victor Mbindyo
| ICT Manager



Address:
Bellways Centre, 2nd Floor
| P.O Box 7193 - 00300 Nairobi

Email:
vmbindyo@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke
|

Mobile: 0726 767 977, 0111 549 761, 0738 087 202
|Ext.

Subject: Kenload Version 2 Issues

Dear Michael,
 
Kindly confirm the status of the below Kenload v2 issues which have been raised.
 
Busia station;
1. The system is not computing the fines/fees to be paid by the transporter under EAC Act as shown in the attached ticket for truck KDG618U.These forces us to continue with the manual computation of the rates which is prone to errors.
We are changing how it picks.
2. The system on occasions sends the same trucks to yard more than once at the same time i.e., KCQ266U (17th July 2022 at 2106 hours)
We will update to solve the issue
3. The system sends trucks that have legal weights to the yard. i.e. KCF589N (20th July 2022 at 1450 hours) and KCF319W (17th July 2022 at 1736 hours) yet the exit tickets are indicated legal.
We will update to solve the issue

4. Kindly enable Computer Operator Weighing admit trucks that are offloading, especially those with valid permits, which are yet to offload to legal weights to the yard.
We will resolve this part with the update.

5. We have trucks with Valid permits charged and sent to yard by the system yet while weighing the truck, the COW, had the Popup of the valid permit details displayed on the screen and the truck right fully exited from the multideck. I.e., KCP822R (19th July 2022 at 2237hours) and KCX120S (20th July 2022 at 1754hours
We will resolve this part with the update.

6. Check on the configurations and remove those with the wrong permissible weights i.e., 6*S/WD/DDD that give 48,500 kgs as permissible weight instead of the 49,000kgs.
This is resolved. Confirm

For the COP they can add the vehicle on the case details.

8. The system is unable to save the Scale tests.
We have worked on it. Check after the update.
9. Some overload trucks are not sent to yard i.e KBL792M (24th July 2022) .
This Vehicle was not found
10. The system is special releasing vehicle with the first weight even after redistribution of the overload.

11. Front view NPR on both bounds is not scanning number plates and capturing images.
This is resolved. Confirm!
Rongo Station;
1. There axles trucks have their GVW weights wrongly configured to 35000kg and 30500kg instead of 26000kg and 23750kg for 3A and 3* Respectively.
This is resolved. Confirm!
2. Special configuration trucks like 6*SWDDDD has been assigned less weights instead of 49000kgs.This should be reviewed for all those trucks with special kind of configurations.
This is resolved. Confirm!
3. Time frames for reweighs are not shown.

4. There are no prior alerts or notifications for vehicles coming for re-weigh.
This is resolved. Confirm!
5. Billing sheet for charged vehicles in conservation from USD to KES.
To be solve on update
6. Weights taken during the initial weighing is sometimes lost forcing the computer operator to re-weigh the truck again.
We have tested on our end not seen the issue. We will update and then check If it will occur.

7. The COPs have no right to raise billing sheets, yet this is their responsibilities.
This is resolved. Confirm!
8. The system is not able to feed impounded trucks data from the VI.
We have shown the today VI on how to add the Heavy Vehicles

 
 
Regards,
 
Victor Mbindyo | ICT Manager Address: Bellways Centre, 2nd Floor | P.O Box 7193 - 00300 Nairobi
Email: vmbindyo@gokhanmasterspacejv.co.ke |
Mobile: 0726 767 977, 0111 549 761, 0738 087 202 |Ext.
